about.title: About $ONETAP
about.subtitle: The Legend Behind the Token
about.story: $ONETAP was born from the passion of gamers who lived through the golden age of Counter-Strike. Remember those legendary AWP shots? The rush of adrenaline when you landed that perfect headshot? That's the spirit we've captured in this memecoin.
about.story2: We're not just another crypto project - we're a community of gamers, developers, and crypto enthusiasts united by nostalgia and the belief that gaming culture deserves its place in the blockchain revolution.
about.missionText: To create the ultimate gaming memecoin that bridges the gap between traditional gaming communities and the decentralized finance world. We're building more than a token - we're building a movement.
about.visionText: To become the go-to cryptocurrency for gamers worldwide, with partnerships across esports, gaming platforms, and DeFi protocols. We envision a future where $ONETAP is accepted in gaming stores, tournaments, and metaverse platforms.
about.communityDrivenText: Built by gamers, for gamers. Every holder has a voice in our journey through DAO governance.
about.liquidityLockedText: 100% liquidity locked for 3 months. Your investment is secured with transparent smart contracts.
about.fairLaunchText: No presale, no team tokens, no VCs. Everyone starts on equal ground, just like a competitive match.
about.toTheMoonText: Aggressive marketing strategy, esports partnerships, and influencer collaborations to reach new heights.
about.disclaimerNote: Disclaimer: $ONETAP is not affiliated with Valve Corporation or Counter-Strike. This is an independent community project inspired by gaming culture.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and designed for sustainable growth with revolutionary deflationary mechanisms
tokenomics.note: 100% Fair Launch. Liquidity locked for 3 months. ERC20 standard on Base network.
tokenomics.antiWhaleText: Maximum transaction limit of 2% of total supply to prevent dumps
tokenomics.burnMechanismText: 1% of each transaction is permanently burned, increasing scarcity over time
tokenomics.rewardsText: Automatic reflections to holders - earn passive income just by holding
